mapper.sql: id, vtname, vtphone, vtsex, vtidentity, vtroom, vtbetime, vtendtime, vtdes
mapper.insert:
insert into dt_visitor
id,
vtname,
vtphone,
vtsex,
vtidentity,
vtroom,
vtbetime,
vtendtime,
vtdes,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vtphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vtidentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vtroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vtbetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{vtendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{vtdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dt_visitor
vtname = #{vtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtphone = #{vtphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtsex = #{vtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vtidentity = #{vtidentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtroom = #{vtroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtbetime = #{vtbetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vtendtime = #{vtendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vtdes = #{vtdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dt_visitor set vtname = #{vtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtphone = #{vtphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtsex = #{vtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vtidentity = #{vtidentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtroom = #{vtroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtbetime = #{vtbetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vtendtime = #{vtendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vtdes = #{vtdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from dt_visitor
and vtname like concat("%",#{vtname},"%")
and vtphone like concat("%",#{vtphone},"%")
and vtsex=#{vtsex}
and vtidentity like concat("%",#{vtidentity},"%")
and vtroom like concat("%",#{vtroom},"%")
and vtbetime >= #{vtbetime}
and vtendtime <=#{vtendtime}
and vtdes like concat("%",#{vtdes},"%")
order by vtendtime
